insert into five_finance_transfer_accounts (business_key, form_no, account_name, out_bank_name, out_bank_account, in_bank_name, in_bank_account, applicant, applicant_name, applicant_time, account_number, dept_id, dept_name, remark, creator, creator_name, is_deleted, is_process_end, gmt_create, gmt_modified, process_instance_id, receive, receive_name, receive_dept_name, title, project_id, project_name, business_manager, business_manager_name, total_money, total_apply_money, state) values (#{businessKey,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{formNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{accountName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{outBankName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{outBankAccount,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{inBankName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{inBankAccount,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{applicant,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{applicantName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{applicantTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{accountNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{deptId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{deptName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{creator,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{creatorName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{deleted,jdbcType=BIT}, #{processEnd,jdbcType=BIT}, #{gmtCreate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{gmtModified,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{processInstanceId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{receive,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{receiveName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{receiveDeptName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{title,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{projectId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{projectName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{businessManager,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{businessManagerName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{totalMoney,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{totalApplyMoney,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{state,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.update: update five_finance_transfer_accounts set business_key = #{businessKey,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, form_no = #{formNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, account_name = #{accountName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, out_bank_name = #{outBankName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, out_bank_account = #{outBankAccount,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, in_bank_name = #{inBankName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, in_bank_account = #{inBankAccount,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, applicant = #{applicant,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, applicant_name = #{applicantName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, applicant_time = #{applicantTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, account_number = #{accountNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, dept_id = #{deptId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, dept_name = #{deptName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, remark = #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, creator = #{creator,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, creator_name = #{creatorName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, is_deleted = #{deleted,jdbcType=BIT}, is_process_end = #{processEnd,jdbcType=BIT}, gmt_create = #{gmtCreate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, gmt_modified = #{gmtModified,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, process_instance_id = #{processInstanceId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, receive = #{receive,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, receive_name = #{receiveName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, receive_dept_name = #{receiveDeptName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, title = #{title,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, project_id = #{projectId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, project_name = #{projectName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, business_manager = #{businessManager,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, business_manager_name = #{businessManagerName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, total_money = #{totalMoney,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, total_apply_money = #{totalApplyMoney,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, state = #{state,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select id, business_key, form_no, account_name, out_bank_name, out_bank_account, in_bank_name, in_bank_account, applicant, applicant_name, applicant_time, account_number, dept_id, dept_name, remark, creator, creator_name, is_deleted, is_process_end, gmt_create, gmt_modified, process_instance_id, receive, receive_name, receive_dept_name, title, project_id, project_name, business_manager, business_manager_name, total_money, total_apply_money, state from five_finance_transfer_accounts where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}

select id, business_key, form_no, account_name, out_bank_name, out_bank_account, in_bank_name, in_bank_account, applicant, applicant_name, applicant_time, account_number, dept_id, dept_name, remark, creator, creator_name, is_deleted, is_process_end, gmt_create, gmt_modified, process_instance_id, receive, receive_name, receive_dept_name, title, project_id, project_name, business_manager, business_manager_name, total_money, total_apply_money, state from five_finance_transfer_accounts
order by id desc
